title: Black Forever
description: I’m happier than I’ve ever been.Calloway and I share a home together, and I love having dinner on the table when he comes home from work. It’s domestic bliss—and I hope that bliss lasts forever.He still gives me his orders, the authority ringing in his voice, telling me exactly what to do and when to do it. When his inner Dom comes out, he’s a different man…and I like it. But I could never do more than this, could never let him actually strike me with a whip or chain. It’s enough for me—and I hope it’s enough for him.But then I discover Calloway’s horrible secret, a secret worse than the first one. All my fears came true like I wished for them. I thought he could change for me, but he can’t. If I want this relationship to survive, I’m the one that has to change.But I’m not sure if I can…Pick up the last installment of this bdsm romance now by clicking the BUY NOW button at the top of this page. This dom romance is also available in Kindle Unlimited!
author: Victoria Quinn
